general.name: Iain McCall
general.headline: Software Developer
about: I'm a software developer based in Glasgow, Scotland.

I developed a love for technology while working in animation and video production. I became so interested in the software that I was using that I decided to start making it instead. I am fascinated by design patterns and full stack architectures, as well as modern front end frameworks like React. I enjoy bringing my project management and soft skills to new software development challenges.
The background of this site is an interactive physics simulation. Have a play around!
